thread.title: England boss Gareth Southgate brings in ‘wellness sessions’ for squad including urine tests and sleep monitoring
thread.title_full: England boss Gareth Southgate brings in ‘wellness sessions’ for squad including urine tests and sleep monitoring

author: whaughton
title: England boss Gareth Southgate brings in ‘wellness sessions’ for squad including urine tests and sleep monitoring
text:
Are you well? England boss Gareth Southgate brings in ‘wellness sessions’ for squad including urine tests and sleep monitoring 
Southgate has enlisted the help of new FA head of performance and nutrition to leave no stone unturned ahead of the World Cup in Russia next year By Warren Haughton 31st March 2017, 9:52 am Updated: 31st March 2017, 10:14 am
